mapper.select:
select count(id) from cust_warranty WHERE account_uuid=#{account_uuid} AND state=1
and `warranty_code` like concat("%",#{search},"%")
and `warranty_status` in (${status_string})

select
from cust_warranty WHERE warranty_uuid=#{_parameter} AND state=1

select
from cust_warranty
id<#{page.lastId}
id<=(select id from cust_warranty where account_uuid=#{account_uuid} AND state=1
and `warranty_code` like concat("%",#{search},"%")
and `warranty_status` in (${status_string})
ORDER BY `cust_warranty`.`id` DESC limit #{page.start},1 )
1=1
and account_uuid=#{account_uuid} AND state = 1
and `warranty_code` like concat("%",#{search},"%")
and `warranty_status` in (${status_string})
ORDER BY `cust_warranty`.`id` DESC limit #{page.offset}

select count(id) from cust_warranty
manager_uuid=#{manager_uuid} AND state = 1
and `warranty_code` like concat("%",#{search},"%")
and `type`=#{type}

select
from cust_warranty WHERE `channel_id`=#{channel_id} AND `warranty_status`!= 1 AND `warranty_status`!= 6 AND state = 1
